section.simpara: Provision a calling IAXy device, optionally using the specified template.
Provisions a calling IAXy device with template. If no template is used, the default is used. IAXy templates are defined in iaxprov.conf.
Returns 0 on success or -1 on failure.

formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'IAX2Provision' =-
[Synopsis] Provision a calling IAXy with a given template
[Description] IAX2Provision([template]): Provisions the calling IAXy (assuming the calling entity is in fact an IAXy) with the given template or default if one is not specified. Returns -1 on error or 0 on success.
